subject: Fw: Thanks for your recent application, we accepted your appication
body:
Your your credit report doesn't matter to us!
 
If your family OWN property and want IMMEDIATE pocket money to spend ANY way you like, or simply require to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you TONIGHT (hurry, this lot will expire NOW):
 
$348,000+ loan
 
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest payments!
 
Hurry, when our best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill out this simplified form... 
 
Do not worry about approval, your your credit report will not disqualify you!
 
http://whoodiasir.com/
